de.griefed.serverpackcreator.spring.curseforge

Class CurseController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.griefed.serverpackcreator.spring.curseforge.CurseController

  • @RestController
 @CrossOrigin(origins="*")
 @RequestMapping(value="/api/v1/curse")
public class CurseController
extends java.lang.Object
    RestController for everything CurseForge related.
    All requests are in /api/v1/curse.

    • Method Detail

      • task

        @CrossOrigin(origins="*")
 @GetMapping(value="task")
public java.lang.String task(@RequestParam(value="modpack",defaultValue="10,60018")
                                                                                  java.lang.String modpack)
        GET request for requesting the generation of a server pack. RequestParam is modpack=projectID,fileID
        Returns a NotificationResponse.curseResponse(int, int, String, int, String, String) or NotificationResponse.curseResponse(String, int, String, int, String, String) depending on the decision made in CurseService.
        Parameters:
        modpack - CurseForge projectID and fileID combination.
        Returns:
        String. Statuscode indicating whether the server pack already exists, will be generated or an error occured.

      • regenerate

        @CrossOrigin(origins="*")
 @GetMapping(value="/regenerate")
public java.lang.String regenerate(@RequestParam(value="modpack",defaultValue="10,60018")
                                                                                               java.lang.String modpack)
        GET request for requesting the regeneration of a server pack. RequestParam is modpack=projectID,fileID
        Returns a NotificationResponse.curseResponse(int, int, String, int, String, String) or NotificationResponse.curseResponse(String, int, String, int, String, String) depending on the decision made in CurseService.
        Parameters:
        modpack - CurseForge projectID and fileID combination.
        Returns:
        String. Returns a NotificationResponse depending on the outcome of CurseService.regenerateFromCurseModpack(String).

      • regenerateActivated

        @CrossOrigin(origins="*")
 @GetMapping(value="/regenerate/active")
public java.lang.String regenerateActivated()
        GET request to check whether regeneration of server packs is available on this instance of ServerPackCreator.
        Returns:
        JSON. Returns {"regenerationActivated": true/false}
